title: codereview: extension doesn't work with hg 2.7
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. hg change
2. Write a change description that cannot be parsed properly (e.g. malformed description)
3.

What is the expected output?
A prompt asking me if I want to edit the change

What do you see instead?
See attached stacktrace

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?


Which operating system are you using?


Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
hg 2.7

Please provide any additional information below.
Apparently hg 2.7 changed the API of the promptchoice function, which causes the
codereview extension to crash when displaying prompts (See attached file for stacktrace).

Something like https://github.com/pbiggar/trychooser/pull/32 could be taken as
inspiration for how to handle it.
Attachments: 1. traceback.log (2245 bytes)
